Room.Name: Center Drive/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Center Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Center Drive runs north from the intersection with Darmanian Way, which runs east and west. To the south, you can see the crystal waters of the Lyanden Lake. You can also make out the magnificent Lyanden Castle, built on the island in the middle of the lake for security purposes.
